description:
The Zenos can hardly contain their excitement for the tournament to come. The participating universes are recruiting at different rates, so hopefully they can gather enough warriors before the deadline!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kachinokoru no wa Dono Uchuu Da!? Zokuzoku to Tsudou Saikyou no Senshi-tachi!!
Welches Universum wird siegen? – Die stärksten Krieger versammeln sich!
Which Universe Will Survive?! The Strongest Warriors Are Gathering!!
勝ち残るのはどの宇宙だ!? 続々と集う最強の戦士たち!!
